description:
The group who took control of Botan`s emotions and stole her Shard of Tesla is Una Casita, the secret organization Jingo mentioned earlier. Botan and the Japanese team work with the CIA team of Mickey and Oliver to pursue Una Casita members Pino and Elmo.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: "Kuufukukan, Oyobi, Sore ni Mukiau Kakugo" ni Tsuite no Kousatsu
A Consideration on `Hunger, and the Readiness to Face It`
「空腹感, および, それに向き合う覚悟」についての考察
